
Prerequisites
---
* need to build a Lampalab/iota_fpga environment

Quickly start
---

```
root@lampa:~# sh init_curl_pow.sh

root@lampa:~# cd verify_dcurl_fpga_lampalab/

root@lampa:~/verify_dcurl_fpga_lampalab# make

root@lampa:~/verify_dcurl_fpga_lampalab# ./main 14 

Transaction with valid NONCE


Hash rate = 13253012 hash/sec
```
